titles: The soules preparation for Christ. Or, A treatise of contrition Wherein is discovered how God breaks the heart and wounds the soule, in the conversion of a sinner to Himselfe.
author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.
publisher: Printed [by M. Flesher] for Robert Davvlman, at the signe of the Brazen-serpent in Pauls Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
